data.description:
Ration packs are compact meals that take up little room (you can fit six in a pouch designed to carry a data pad) but have all the requirements to nourish a person for one day. Each ration pack is geared for a range of species. The food isn’t appetizing, and it doesn’t include water, but it does prevent malnutrition.

Type: Standard dehydrated food pack

Cost: 2

Availability: 5

Game Notes: Each dehydrated food pack contains enough nourishment for a human for one meal (does not include liquids).

Developer Note: The quantity is three to make it easier to purchase rations for a player for an entire day.
data.label: OD6S.CHAR_GEAR
